alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 22 at 8:09AM MST until March 22 at 1:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM MST /2 PM MDT/ THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph, with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...The Mogollon Rim east of Flagstaff, the White Mountains and the Little Colorado River Valley. * WHEN...Until 1 PM MST /2 PM MDT/ this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Black Mesa Area; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; White Mountains
